prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Guitar, Reed, Organ, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
Organ, Reed, Guitar, and Drums are all featured in this song, but Bass is absent.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Drums, Guitar, Reed, and Organ, but Bass is not included.

Style 3:
No Bass is present in this song, but it does include Drums, Guitar, Reed, and Organ.
